reviewtext: For the money this is a good quality piece.  The wide metal band is durable but at the same time awkward because it is so wide.  There were only two problems.  One is that it hurts my ears a little.  But that is livable.  The other is that it advertises that it comes with a "case" which is actually a cheap plasticy bag that is slightly smaller then the headphones.  I really need a carrying case so I will have to find something else stronger and a little large so I can carry this in my pack without destroying it.
summary: Good value but don't believe the "case" it advertises
